text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Bakhmutsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 169 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 10 km from Yermolayevo, 2 km from Bakhmut. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Pokrovka, Kuyurgazinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
